doc.after: Evidence of wheeled vehicles appears from the second half of the 4th millennium BC near simultaneously in Mesopotamia Sumerian civilization the Northern Caucasus Maykop culture and Central Europe so that the question of which culture originally invented the wheeled vehicle is still unsolved
